title: #58: Survivors and Profiling in the Baton Rouge Killing
description:
Comparative case analysis of potentially linked offences in the series. The #RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti)  answer some listener questions about criminal behavioral analysis  #BatonRouge #KillingBayous
#HerNameWasEugenie #HerNameWasChristine
#HerNameWasMarieAnn #HerNameWasEleanor
#HisNameWasGlen #HerNameWasMelinda #HerNameISCollette #HerNameISJacqueline #HerNameISCassandra
